short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom scrollbar matching Brave dark theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom scrollbar matching Brave dark theme made for myself because brave keeps showing ugly white scrollbars. Use as you want, no warranty.

If you have any privacy concern, unpack the extension, you'll see it's just a css file.
